vlive.korean: 허황된 욕심을 내지 말라고 하네요. They are telling me not to be too greedy. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : [치열업] 브이앱 1주년♡새해 인사
vlive.english: They are telling me not to be too greedy.

vlive.korean: 내가 하고싶은 꿈이 허황된 것 같다. Your dream seems a bit foolish, or unrealistic. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 화요병인사람~~~~~?
vlive.english: Your dream seems a bit foolish, or unrealistic.

vlive.korean: 약간 반발심리에 올렸다라는 허황된 주장이 좀 있었어요. There was a opinion that she posted because of her rebellious mind. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 WITH 스타트렉 배우 내한 현장 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: There was a opinion that she posted because of her rebellious mind.

vlive.korean: '제가 하고싶은 꿈이 허황된 것 같으면 그냥 꿈으로 지녀야 할까요?' "If my dream seems unrealistic should I keep it as just a dream?" 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 화요병인사람~~~~~?
vlive.english: "If my dream seems unrealistic should I keep it as just a dream?"

vlive.korean: 다만, 움직이지 않거나 허황된 욕심은 흉사가 됨을 또한 명심해야 합니다. However, chasing hollow dreams or standing still will not do good for you. 듣기 View video B.A.P : [REPLAY] B.A.P 컴백 Vring U 꽃을 든 남자들(B.A.P with flowers)
vlive.english: However, chasing hollow dreams or standing still will not do good for you.

examples.korean: Helmets can give cyclists a false sense of security. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 헬멧 때문에 오토바이 운전자가 허황된 안전감을 가질 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
